summary: AI Engineer and Cloud Systems Architect with 10+ years building production AI/ML systems and scalable distributed applications at Google, USAA, and FedEx. Expert in designing multi-modal AI pipelines, optimizing ML infrastructure, and deploying AI systems at scale. Proven track record with cloud ML platforms (AWS SageMaker, GCP AI), distributed systems optimization, and leading teams to deliver AI solutions serving millions of users.

experience.title: AI Systems Architect & Cloud Engineer
experience.description: Architect and deploy production-ready AI systems generating personalized content with focus on ML pipeline optimization and scalability
achievements: Architected and deployed production-ready AI system generating personalized children's books using multi-modal AI pipeline with AWS SageMaker and containerized ML services
Implemented scalable multi-modal AI pipeline with auto-scaling capabilities, achieving 30-60 second end-to-end processing with 99.9% uptime serving 500+ concurrent users
Built fault-tolerant ML system architecture using Docker containers and load balancers with comprehensive content safety validation achieving 99.5% safety score
Optimized AI infrastructure costs by 40% through efficient resource management, model optimization, and automated ML scaling policies
Developed MLOps pipeline with automated model deployment, reducing deployment time from hours to minutes while maintaining zero-downtime updates
Implemented comprehensive ML monitoring and alerting system using CloudWatch for proactive model performance tracking and drift detection
Built Infrastructure as Code using Terraform for consistent ML environment provisioning and automated AI model deployment
Integrated distributed AI content generation system with safety validation services and real-time performance optimization

experience.title: Software Engineer - Distributed AI Systems
experience.description: Design and optimize distributed AI/ML systems and algorithms for global-scale Android services affecting millions of devices
achievements: Designed and implemented automated ML tools for distributed Android services, reducing manual AI model maintenance overhead by 60% across global infrastructure
Built cloud-native AI monitoring system preventing 15+ production incidents through early detection of ML model compatibility and performance issues
Optimized distributed AI system memory usage by 35% through advanced algorithmic improvements affecting millions of Android devices worldwide
Implemented ML-powered ProguardMap processing optimization reducing AI infrastructure resource consumption by 40% during model training and inference
Developed multi-process AI service mapping algorithms decreasing GMSCore memory footprint by 25% across distributed mobile ML services
Maintained 99.5% AI service availability through proactive ML monitoring, automated alerting, and rapid AI incident response procedures
Led AI infrastructure modernization initiatives reducing technical debt by 30% and improving ML system maintainability and scalability
Built advanced performance analysis tools for distributed AI systems using ML profiling techniques to identify optimization opportunities
Implemented automated testing and deployment pipelines for AI/ML services ensuring reliable delivery of critical mobile intelligence updates

experience.title: ML Software Developer & AI Architect
experience.description: Architect ML-powered mobile backend services and AI systems for financial services platform with focus on predictive analytics
achievements: Architected ML-powered mobile backend services handling 10M+ API requests monthly with 99.8% availability and intelligent caching for financial data analysis
Implemented AI-driven caching strategies and optimized ML API architecture, reducing cloud service costs by 40% and improving ML inference response times
Built cloud-native mobile AI components using modern ML architecture patterns, improving user engagement by 25% through predictive features
Designed automated ML testing pipeline achieving 70%+ code coverage and reducing AI model deployment risks through comprehensive ML quality gates
Led cloud ML migration initiatives and AI infrastructure modernization projects, improving ML system reliability and reducing operational overhead
Implemented real-time ML monitoring using Firebase Analytics and custom AI dashboards, maintaining proactive ML model health management
Architected AI proof-of-concept solutions for new ML features reducing development time by 20% through reusable ML cloud components
Built resilient ML microservices architecture supporting critical financial AI services with disaster recovery capabilities
Mentored 5+ developers on cloud-native ML development practices, MLOps automation, and scalable AI architecture design
